description: Version compatibility negotiation via validateCompatibility(). Note: v7.9.1 CONTRACT_VERSION accepts all peers — this is an EXPECTED_CHANGE from v7.0.0 behavior. The actual version-pair enforcement is done by arrakis-compat.ts which wraps validateCompatibility with stricter logic. See delta-log for details.

fixtures.description: v5.9.0 — canonical validateCompatibility accepts (arrakis-compat.ts may add stricter logic)
